contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September 2002, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is VACATED and REMANDED to the Superior Court for reconsideration in light of Southard v. Temple University Hospital, 566 Pa. 335, 781 A.2d 101 (2001).
Jurisdiction relinquished.
